KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: This issue is active and can be attached to holds
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Active

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The hold is inactive an cannot be attached to new holds
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Inactive

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: This restriction is active and should be enforced
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Active

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The restriction is inactive and should not be enforced
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Inactive

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: This hold is active and should be enforced
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Active

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The hold was canceled or removed because it was originally put on in error
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Canceled

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The hold was active and the issue has been resolved
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Released

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: New roster entry

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Assigned

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Saved

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The roster has has been submitted
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Submitted

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The instructor is assigned to teach this course or section.
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Assigned

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The student was registered but subsequently dropped the course or section within the normally allotted time period
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Dropped

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The student was registered but subsequently dropped the course or section past the normally allotted time period,typically resulting in a special grade or mark to so indicate
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Dropped Late

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The student has registered for the course by has not paid the fee
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Fee Not Paid

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The student plans on taking this course or program
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Planned

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The student is officially registered for the course or section
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Registered

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The student attempted to join but has been put on the waitlist
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Waitlisted

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: Transaction Item failed
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Transaction Item Failed

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The student is attemptng to enroll in this course or section.
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: New

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: Transaction Item Succeeded
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Transaction Item Succeeded

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Active

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Accepted

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Deleted

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The result (grade) has been entered and has been saved but not yet been submitted
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Saved

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Submitted

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Active

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: The relationship between the two LUIs is in-active
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Inactive

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Approved

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: Once offered but now canceled
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Canceled

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: Logically deleted before ever having been offered
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Deleted

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: Proposed for Departmental Planning purposed
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Draft

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: Offered so it shows up in list of classes so student may register for the course
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Offered

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: Approved and ready to be scheduled
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Scheduled

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Submitted

KSEN_COMM_STATE.DESCR: Suspends registration in the course but allows students who had already registered to stay in the course
KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Suspended

The result has been approved to be used and awarded

KSEN_COMM_STATE.NAME: Ready
